I am a PhD Student at the [Institute of Economics, Corvinus University of Budapest](https://www.uni-corvinus.hu/elerhetosegek/horvath-peter/).  My research interests are in empirical macroeconomics and monetary policy. My ongoing research covers topics on 

- the impact of monetary shocks on the housing market, 
- NLP applications in monetary policy analysis, 
- traditional macroeconometrics. 

See more on my research [here](./papers.html).
